row.process: :SET &EXCLUDE_TYPE#="FOLD STORE CLNT" :SET &CLIENT#="105" :SET &EXPORT_FOLDER#="C:\TEMP\EXPORT\&CLIENT#\" :SET &X#=0 :SET &HND# = PREP_PROCESS_VAR(VARA.SQLI.EXPORT.1) :PROCESS &HND# : SET &ONAME# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&HND#,1) : SET &OTYPE# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&HND#,3) : SET &OCLIENT# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&HND#,4) : IF &OCLIENT# = &CLIENT# : SET &LOCATION# = STR_FIND(&EXCLUDE_TYPE#, &OTYPE#) : IF &LOCATION# EQ 0 : SET &FILE#= &EXPORT_FOLDER#&OTYPE#_&ONAME#.xml : SET &RET# = EXPORT(&ONAME#,&FILE#,"N") : IF &RET# GT 0 : PRINT "ERREUR export &ONAME# &FILE#" : ENDIF : IF &RET# EQ 0 : SET &X#=&X# + 1 : ENDIF : ENDIF : ENDIF :ENDPROCESS :PRINT "&X# exported objects"
